entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:43AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Benton and northeastern Washington Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 143 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Gravette to 5 miles east of Decatur to 4 miles south of Springtown. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Benton; Washington
